questions.question: What does Phoebe say when Rachel asks where her dad is?
options: At Flimby's
At Central Perk
At Monica's apartment
At Ross's apartment
questions.correct_answer: At Flimby's
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Rachel that her dad is at Flimby's, but later reveals it's just a word she uses when she can't remember the real thing.

questions.question: Why does Joey need two tickets for the premiere?
options: Because he's bringing his parents
Because he's bringing a date and himself
Because he's bringing his agent and himself
Because he's bringing Monica and her boyfriend
questions.correct_answer: Because he's bringing a date and himself
questions.explanation: Joey tells the gang that he needs two tickets, and when asked who the second ticket is for, he says it's for a date type person.

questions.question: What does Ross say when he and Rachel try to shake hands with their dates?
options: Break a leg
And... break
Good luck
Let's do this
questions.correct_answer: And... break
questions.explanation: Ross says 'And... break' as they all try to shake hands at the same time and end up crossing their arms.

questions.question: What is Tommy's reaction when he thinks Ross is going to spill hot coffee on him?
options: He stays calm and walks away
He laughs and jokes about it
He gets angry and yells at Ross
He tries to grab the coffee from Ross
questions.correct_answer: He gets angry and yells at Ross
questions.explanation: Tommy gets angry and yells at Ross, calling him a 'big, dumb, stupid, doofy idiot'.

questions.question: Why does Cailin decide to leave Ross at the party?
options: Because she doesn't like the music
Because she doesn't like the food
Because she doesn't want to wait around for Tommy to stop yelling
Because she doesn't feel like standing around all night waiting for Ross to calm down
questions.correct_answer: Because she doesn't feel like standing around all night waiting for Ross to calm down
questions.explanation: Cailin tells Ross that she's leaving because she doesn't want to stand around all night waiting for him to calm down, implying that she's not interested in him anymore.

questions.question: What does Joey do when he finds out Kate got a job in L.A.?
options: He tries to convince her to stay
He wishes her luck and says goodbye
He gets angry and storms off
He tries to go with her to L.A.
questions.correct_answer: He tries to convince her to stay
questions.explanation: Joey tries to convince Kate to stay, telling her that she can visit the museums and that he'll go to the airport with her to say goodbye.

questions.question: What does Tommy do when the chick poops on his hand?
options: He laughs and jokes about it
He stays calm and cleans his hand
He gets angry and yells at the chick
He tries to give the chick to someone else
questions.correct_answer: He gets angry and yells at the chick
questions.explanation: Tommy gets angry and yells at the chick, calling it 'stupid' and 'disgusting'.

questions.question: What is the name of the play that Joey is in?
options: Boxing Day
The One With The Screamer
General Hospital
Blargon 7
questions.correct_answer: Boxing Day
questions.explanation: The play that Joey is in is called 'Boxing Day', as mentioned by the director when he reads the review.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say when she's trying to get off the phone with the hold voice?
options: I'm going to hang up now
I'm still here, don't switch
I'm going to call back later
I'm going to put the phone down
questions.correct_answer: I'm still here, don't switch
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'I'm still here, don't switch' when she's trying to get off the phone with the hold voice.

questions.question: Why does Ross think Tommy is bad news for Rachel?
options: Because Tommy is mean and screamed at strangers
Because Tommy is too old for Rachel
Because Tommy is too young for Rachel
Because Tommy is not trustworthy
questions.correct_answer: Because Tommy is mean and screamed at strangers
questions.explanation: Ross thinks Tommy is bad news for Rachel because he screamed at strangers and is mean, as seen at the premiere.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Kate when she's leaving for L.A.?
options: I'll never forget you
I'll come with you to L.A.
I'll wait for you to come back
I'll never love again
questions.correct_answer: I'll never forget you
questions.explanation: Joey tells Kate that he'll never forget her as she's leaving for L.A.

questions.question: What does the director say when he reads the review of the play?
options: It's a great review, let's celebrate
It's a terrible review, I quit
It's a mixed review, let's work on it
It's a good review, but Joey is uneven
questions.correct_answer: It's a terrible review, I quit
questions.explanation: The director says 'You've ruined my life' and storms off after reading the review, which criticizes the play and the actors.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do with Monica and Rachel's stuff while they're out?
options: She puts it away in their rooms
She throws it away
She gives it to Joey
She swaps their stuff
questions.correct_answer: She swaps their stuff
questions.explanation: Phoebe swaps Monica and Rachel's stuff while they're out, as seen when they return and find their belongings in each other's rooms.

questions.question: What does Tommy do when he's talking to Ross at Central Perk?
options: He stays calm and talks to Ross
He gets angry and yells at Ross
He ignores Ross and walks away
He tries to make friends with Ross
questions.correct_answer: He stays calm and talks to Ross
questions.explanation: Tommy stays calm and talks to Ross at Central Perk, despite Ross's warnings about his behavior.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Lauren when she's waiting for him onstage?
options: I'm coming right up
I'm running late, sorry
I'm not coming up, I'm leaving
I'm going to get a drink
questions.correct_answer: I'm coming right up
questions.explanation: Joey tells Lauren that he's coming right up when she's waiting for him onstage.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Tommy when he's trying to warn Rachel about him?
options: He's a great guy, you should date him
He's mean and screams at strangers
He's not trustworthy, be careful
He's perfect for you, Rachel
questions.correct_answer: He's mean and screams at strangers
questions.explanation: Ross warns Rachel that Tommy is mean and screams at strangers, citing his behavior at the premiere.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say when she's still on hold after hours?
options: I'm going to hang up now
I'm still here, don't switch
I'm going to call back later
I'm fine, thanks for asking
questions.correct_answer: I'm fine, thanks for asking
questions.explanation: Phoebe says she's fine when Monica asks her how she's doing after being on hold for hours.

questions.question: What does Joey do when he finds out Kate is leaving for L.A.?
options: He tries to convince her to stay
He wishes her luck and says goodbye
He gets angry and storms off
He tries to go with her to L.A.
questions.correct_answer: He tries to convince her to stay
questions.explanation: Joey tries to convince Kate to stay, telling her that she can visit the museums and that he'll go to the airport with her to say goodbye.

questions.question: What does the director do when he reads the review of the play?
options: He celebrates with the cast and crew
He quits and storms off
He tries to fix the problems mentioned in the review
He ignores the review and continues with the play
questions.correct_answer: He quits and storms off
questions.explanation: The director says 'You've ruined my life' and storms off after reading the review, which criticizes the play and the actors.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when she's on hold for hours?
options: She hangs up and calls back later
She stays on the line and waits for someone to answer
She puts the phone down and does something else
She swaps Monica and Rachel's stuff
questions.correct_answer: She stays on the line and waits for someone to answer
questions.explanation: Phoebe stays on the line for hours, waiting for someone to answer, and even swaps Monica and Rachel's stuff while she's waiting.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Kate when she's leaving for L.A.?
options: I'll never forget you
I'll come with you to L.A.
I'll wait for you to come back
I'll never love again
questions.correct_answer: I'll never forget you
questions.explanation: Joey tells Kate that he'll never forget her as she's leaving for L.A.

questions.question: What does Tommy do when he's talking to Ross at Central Perk?
options: He stays calm and talks to Ross
He gets angry and yells at Ross
He ignores Ross and walks away
He tries to make friends with Ross
questions.correct_answer: He stays calm and talks to Ross
questions.explanation: Tommy stays calm and talks to Ross at Central Perk, despite Ross's warnings about his behavior.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Tommy when he's trying to warn Rachel about him?
options: He's a great guy, you should date him
He's mean and screams at strangers
He's not trustworthy, be careful
He's perfect for you, Rachel
questions.correct_answer: He's mean and screams at strangers
questions.explanation: Ross warns Rachel that Tommy is mean and screams at strangers, citing his behavior at the premiere.
